basic.description:
Complex numbers, analytic functions, harmonic functions, Cauchy's Theorem, Taylor and Laurent series, calculus of residues, Rouche's Theorem.
LEARNING HOURS    132 (36L;84P)
basic.subject: MATH
basic.title: Functions of a Complex Variable

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite    MATH281.
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from MATH228; MATH326.
